3.author: xXJayZoneXx
3.body: It is a possibility especially if the monitoring software installed by the school has remote screen viewing capabilities. The laptops issues by the schools in my district do have that capability and the schools say it is to monitor students screens while they take tests to make sure that students aren't looking up the answers, but the software in theory could be activated at any time by a school official. If that were to happen, then message encryption doesn't matter anymore because the message would have already been decrypted on your machine so whatever you see on your screen is what they see. Like another person said it is hard to say without knowing for certain exactly what was installed on that machine at that point in time but yes it is a possibility, however not a very likely one.

3.author: AnhCloudB
3.body: The extension it was using was blockis or something along that name, either blockis or blocksi, i can't remember in detail what they can access, but it should be a lot for a school issued laptop

3.author: AnhCloudB
3.body: Wait, so technically, they could have seen what I was doing? Damn, but I assume they won’t do that? I mean, it is a waste of memory to look at someone’s screen without a reason?

3.author: xXJayZoneXx
3.body: Yes, technically they could have seen something however it is unlikely. The software used in my district does not have the ability to record student's screens, just view them but it requires both the student and the school official to both be online at the same time (like during normal school hours). I have no idea what was used by your school, but I wouldn't worry about it too much. At least with this method school admin cannot go back and review what was on your screen previously so if they didn't see the chat live then they won't see it at all.

5.author: Errora403
5.body: You can still do it with Twitter through third-party services like IFTTT if those services are paying for access to the Twitter API. If they are well-known and profitable services, why would they not? It is then only in their best interest to do so. Some services would lose more money by *not* subscribing to the Twitter API, because then users stop using (parts of) the service. For the record, I am still getting notifications through the service I am using. Screenshot [here](https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/700225985798209668/1073698912973635645/Screenshot_20230210-211601.png).

10.author: SlainAlbatross
10.body:
Yes

On one hand, it's hard to carry tone through text, so some things can be misconstrued online.

When I used to stream on twitch, I came across a fair bit of oddballs. I went as far as doing a background check on one of my fans that I had a bad hunch about and found out they were a sex offender, even though they were "nice" online

However I'm only hearing your side of the story. I tend to be suspicious of everyone online especially if there's a consensus between a group of people that you're weird. Yeah, maybe they could be cliquey and judgmental, or maybe they're going off their gut instinct.

10.author: BustosMan
10.body: Nah they don’t want my apology. For most servers I would but for some I really don’t care at all.

10.author: BustosMan
10.body: The world may never know. How did you even do a background check on them?

10.author: SlainAlbatross
10.body:
I looked through his social media. I traced one of his usernames and found his Facebook account. I have a friend in law enforcement who has an account with a background check service. We searched his name and found criminal records for public masturbation and statutory rape.

Never underestimate the power and sleuthing skills of women with a bad feeling.

17.author: Kaid3n22
17.body:
Not sure, mine was deleted after ~30 days after being falsely disabled for the 2nd time. I would think that either your account can still be recovered by a password reset, discord changed how long it would take for deletion, or there is some special circumstance.

For what reason was your account disabled (check emails if you don't know) and have you tried contacting support? Support may be bots most of the time but usually, you'll get automatically reenabled on the first offense for specific rules.

17.author: Adept_Blackberry_436
17.body: I tried a password reset, it said my account was disabled and i wasn't able to reset it. And I never recieved any emails regarding why my account was disabled. In total i've sent like 15 emails, each about 3-4 days apart, and all of them got bot replies, i replied to those replies and none of them have had a reply from a real person, Likewise I tried contacting support on my other email, they said they couldn't help me as they could only solve problems on the email associated with the account, the lady told me to reply to emails from discord and i'll get a response, but in the 78 days since it's been disabled, i haven't gotten any replies back. Also no, I do not know why it was disabled. All i know is i opened discord, noticed i was logged out, tried logging back in and it said it was disabled. My account got disabled on November 20th, and it would have been deleted on december 20th, but it wasn't. So far nothing is working

17.author: Kaid3n22
17.body: Not sure what you can do then, when my account got disabled I was given a clear reason as to why (got caught in the spam filter), and got it reenabled after around a week after creating a support ticket. Make sure you try creating a support ticket if you haven't.

24.author: yllik0
24.body: if i understand correctly you want them to have the color of the event winner role but still have them displayed as boosters on the side?

24.author: Ok-Bank4268
24.body: If possible. Or even, additionally, have them maintain the booster role, but have it hidden. So on the side he would show as event winner

24.author: yllik0
24.body: Well, you can put the event winner role over the booster role, have the booster role displayed on the member list (if it already isn't) but make the event winner role not display on the member list (disable the "display role members separately from online members" option), put the color you want for the event winner and they'll have that color when they type in chat while being displayed as boosters on the side

27.author: prometheus5500
27.body:
Maybe I didn't explain it well enough. I do not want desktop notifications ever. Constant notifications while I'm gaming and using discord for voice chat with friends is annoying. However, I DO want notifications from a specific discord, but ONLY on my phone. That way, my gaming is never interrupted, but I'm always aware of conversations happening in that one specific discord.  
  
So far, I haven't found a way to do this. I either get zero notifications (muting a server) or I get the mobile notifications I want but ALSO get desktop notifications when I'm on my PC and gaming.

27.author: jetah
27.body:
I'm saying you won't get mobile notifications while using the desktop app.

But check the options.

27.author: prometheus5500
27.body: I still think you're missing what I'm trying to set up. I want mobile notifications. I don't care if I get mobile notifications or not while I'm on desktop, but I don't want desktop notifications when I am on desktop.

30.author: DolphinGaming6
30.body:
For watching videos together, it is recommended that you create a server and use the built-in activities feature. After you're in the activities page, select "Watch YouTube Together." Search for the video you'd like to watch, and watch it.

Make sure both of you are in the voice channel (VC) and are both in the activity.

Sorry about the inconvenience, I hope Discord fixes it soon.

31.author: Spiritual_Bank_704
31.body:
You should now see an orange bar across the top of your screen; this means it worked! The dropdown in the orange bar will show you all the available SKUs for that application; you can select one of them to go to its store page. You can also view your Library and see all the branches of your game automagically there waiting for you!

If for some reason the "Install" button is greyed out, please check the following:

Do you have a LIVE_BUILD_ID on that branch for this SKU? Check with dispatch branch list <application_id>.
Do you have a price tier set for this SKU? If not, pick one!
Once those two conditions are met, you should be good to go!

31.author: Spiritual_Bank_704
31.body: As far as my reading goes there is no fix

31.author: Spiritual_Bank_704
31.body: However opening an image with an image viewer program like “paint” and or windows built in program to view images leaving this program window open and pressing the “print screen” button then going to discord app message pane and using hot key: “ctrl + v” then submitting the message. Is the only work around!
